full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RJE BTZUN RDO RJE RNAL 'BYOR MA N'A RO MKHA' SPYOD MA'I SBYIN SREG GI CHO GA MKHA' SPYOD SGRUB PA'I DGA' STON ZHES BYA BA RDO RJE 'CHANG DBANG PHYUR RAB BRTAN GYI ZHAL SNGA NAS MDZAD PA BZHUGS SO, ,
